system.description: A simple oil or gas lamp, normally containing a flame fueled by an oil or gas reservoir. The flame is shielded by glass, and has a sturdy base allowing it to be placed down without risk of tipping over and breaking. It illuminates the entire surrounding area, and became common again after the War, due to a lack of reliable electrical power. It needs to be refueled periodically, though.
system.effect: Generates bright light within Close range, and dim light within Medium range
